name: Norlick Portfolio
body:
### TEMPORARY
### My Services
## Illustrator, Fine and Concept Artist
I've been Painting, Drawing, and designing visual elements and characters for around 20 years.

## Graphic Design and Web Development
I have around 10 years of experience in Website, Logo and general Graphic design, and have extensive history of back-end coding knowledge with which to implement it.

## Game Design and Programming
I've been designing and programming games privately for over 10 years.
I have extensive experience in gameplay and game engine coding, and have relevant knowledge to create content for these.
